Html:
I can't build the latest code in XNA 4.0.

Is this a 3.0 project? If so, is there a plan to migrate it to 4.0?

I forgot to tell : the 4.0 source contains fbdeprofiler, because I develop on an i5 laptop with integrated intel hd graphics.

And guess who made fbdeprofiler ;)
